@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00012 for Sampling Event EMOBON_BPNS_Wa_22
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: Flanders Marine Institute (VLIZ);Ghent University;Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences;Katholieke Universiteit Leuven
Sampling country: Belgium
Sampling station lat/long: 51.433331:2.808331
Sampling environment: water_column
Sampling station contact name: Klaas Deneudt
Sampling station contact ORCID id: 0000-0002-8559-3508
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51652

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00012
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_BPNS_Wa_22

MetaGOflow run id: HMGW5DSX3.UDI259
